name: Dal Bhat
steps: Rinse lentils. Boil in water with turmeric and salt; simmer 20–30 min until soft.
Heat ghee in a pan. Add cumin seeds, garlic, chili; sauté until golden.
Pour tempering over dal. Simmer 5 min.

name: Momo
steps: Combine filling ingredients in a bowl.
Place a small amount in wrapper center; fold/seal.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
steps: Heat butter; sauté onion till golden.
Add tomato puree, spices, salt; cook till thick.
Stir in cream and paneer; simmer 5–7 min.

name: Chana Masala
steps: Heat oil; add cumin seeds till they splutter.
Stir in tomato puree and spices; cook till thick.
Add chickpeas with ½ cup water; simmer 10 min.

name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
steps: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente. Reserve ¼ cup pasta water; drain.
Heat olive oil in a pan; sauté garlic and chili flakes until golden.
Add spaghetti and pasta water; toss to coat.
Season with salt; mix in parsley and Parmesan, if used.

name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
steps: Season chicken with salt/pepper, grill until cooked; slice.
Toss lettuce with dressing, Parmesan and croutons.
Top with sliced chicken; serve immediately.

name: Tacos al Pastor
steps: Marinate pork in adobo paste for 2 hrs.
Cook pork in skillet until charred.
Warm tortillas; top with pork, onion, cilantro.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, turmeric, and garam masala for at least 1 hour.
Grill or cook chicken in a pan until lightly browned.
In another pan, heat oil, sauté onions, add ginger-garlic paste, and cook until golden.
Add tomato puree, cumin, salt, and cook until thick.
Add cream and grilled chicken, simmer 10 minutes.
Serve hot with naan or rice.

name: Chatamari
steps: Make a thin batter with rice flour and water.
Pour a ladle of batter onto a greased pan like a pizza base.
Top with meat/egg, onion, tomato, garlic paste, and salt.
Cover and cook for 5–7 minutes on low heat.
Serve hot as an appetizer or snack.

name: Butter Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
In a pan, melt butter, sauté onion, add ginger-garlic paste and cook till soft.
Add tomato puree and spices. Cook until thick.
Add cream and chicken. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with butter naan or rice.

name: Fried Rice
steps: Heat oil in a pan, scramble eggs, and set aside.
Add more oil, sauté vegetables for 2–3 minutes.
Add rice, soy sauce, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
Add scrambled eggs, stir everything together.

name: Sel Roti
steps: Grind soaked rice into a smooth batter.
Add sugar, milk, ghee, and cardamom. Mix to make a thick batter.
Heat oil in a pan. Pour batter in a ring shape (like a donut).
Fry both sides till golden brown.
Drain and serve as a festive snack.

name: Vegetable Pulao
steps: Wash and soak rice for 20 minutes.
In a pot, heat oil/ghee. Add cumin seeds and bay leaf.
Add onions and vegetables; sauté 2–3 minutes.
Add soaked rice and water. Add salt.
Cook covered on low heat for 15 minutes.
Fluff and serve with raita or curry.

name: Thukpa
steps: Heat oil, sauté onion and garlic.
Add water and bring to a boil.
Add noodles, soy sauce, salt, pepper.
Cook until noodles are done. Serve hot.

name: Egg Curry
steps: Heat oil, sauté onion until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and spices. Cook 2 mins.
Add tomato puree and cook till thick.
Add eggs and 1/2 cup water. Simmer 10 mins.

name: Biryani
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, turmeric, salt, masala for 1 hour.
In a pan, fry onion till crisp. Remove half for garnish.
Add chicken, tomatoes, cook till chicken is tender.
Layer rice and chicken in a pot, sprinkle saffron milk.
Cover and cook on low heat 15 mins.
Garnish with fried onions. Serve hot.

name: Samosa
steps: Make dough with flour, salt, water; rest for 30 mins.
Sauté cumin seeds, add turmeric, potatoes, peas, masala.
Divide dough, roll into circles, cut in half, shape cones.
Stuff with filling, seal, and deep-fry till golden.

name: Pav Bhaji
ingredients: Lemon wedges and coriander for garnish
steps: Heat butter in a pan, sauté onions till translucent.
Add ginger-garlic paste, then tomatoes and spices. Cook till soft.
Add potatoes and peas. Mash well while cooking.
Simmer with some water to desired consistency.
Toast pav with butter. Serve bhaji with lemon and coriander.

name: Choila
steps: Grill meat and cut into bite-sized pieces.
Mix with onion, garlic, ginger, chili, mustard oil, and salt.
Toss well to combine all flavors.
Garnish with coriander and serve as a spicy snack.

name: Gajar Halwa
steps: In a pan, cook carrots in milk until soft and reduced.
Add ghee and cook until mixture thickens.
Stir in cardamom and garnish with nuts.

name: French Toast
steps: Whisk eggs, milk, sugar, and cinnamon together.
Dip each bread slice into the mixture.
Fry on both sides in a buttered pan until golden brown.
Serve with syrup or powdered sugar.

name: Chicken Sekuwa
steps: Marinate chicken with all spices, oil, and lemon juice for 1 hour.
Skewer and grill or roast until charred and cooked through.
Serve hot with salad and chutney.

name: Spring Rolls
steps: Sauté vegetables with soy sauce, salt, and pepper.
Let the filling cool. Place on wrappers and roll tightly.
Deep-fry until golden. Serve with dipping sauce.

name: Aloo Tama
steps: Add bamboo shoots and potatoes. Mix well.
Add water and simmer for 10–15 minutes.
Adjust salt and serve with rice.

name: Pasta Alfredo
steps: Cook pasta al dente and set aside.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté garlic.
Stir in Parmesan, then mix with pasta.

name: Bhindi Masala
steps: Heat oil, add cumin and sauté onions.
Add tomatoes and spices; cook till soft.
Add okra and cook on low flame until done.

name: Gundruk Soup
steps: Wash gundruk and squeeze excess water.
Sauté garlic, onion, and tomato in mustard oil.
Add gundruk and water. Boil for 10 minutes.

name: Malai Kofta
steps: Mix paneer, potato, and cornflour. Shape into balls and deep fry.
In a pan, sauté onion and ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomato puree, salt, sugar, garam masala. Cook till thick.
Add cream and koftas. Simmer for 5 mins.

name: Yomari
steps: Make dough with rice flour and warm water.
Mix jaggery, coconut, and cardamom for filling.
Shape dough into cones and fill with mixture.

name: Caesar Salad
steps: Chop lettuce and place in bowl.
Add Caesar dressing and toss well.

name: Chicken Lollipop
steps: Marinate chicken in sauces and spices for 1 hour.
Coat in flour and deep fry until crisp.

name: Chatpate
ingredients: Chili, salt, and lemon to taste
steps: Mix all chopped ingredients in a bowl.
Add mustard oil, chili, salt, and lemon juice.
Toss well and garnish with coriander.
Serve immediately as a spicy snack.

name: Paneer Tikka
steps: Marinate paneer in spices and yogurt for 1 hour.
Skewer and grill or bake until browned.

name: Tomato Basil Soup
steps: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add broth and basil; simmer 15 minutes.
Blend until smooth, season, and serve hot.

name: Alu Tama Bodi
steps: Sauté onion, garlic, turmeric. Add potatoes and tama.
Add bodi and water; simmer 15 mins.
Adjust seasoning and serve with rice.

name: Chocolate Mug Cake
steps: Mix all dry ingredients in a mug.
Add milk and oil. Mix until smooth.

name: Baingan Bharta
steps: Roast eggplant until soft; peel and mash.
Sauté onion, garlic, and tomato in oil.
Add chili powder and mashed eggplant.

name: Fish Curry
steps: Heat oil, add mustard seeds till they splutter.
Add onions and sauté till golden.
Add tomatoes and spices, cook till thick.
Add fish pieces, simmer for 10–12 mins.

name: Masoor Dal
steps: Rinse lentils and boil with turmeric and salt until soft.
Heat oil, add cumin and garlic. Sauté till golden.
Add tomato, cook until soft. Pour over dal.
Simmer 5 mins and serve with rice or chapati.

name: Cornbread
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk wet ingredients in another bowl.
Combine and pour into greased baking dish.

name: Chicken Chow Mein
steps: Stir-fry chicken in oil until cooked.
Add garlic, vegetables, sauces. Cook 3 mins.
Add noodles, toss well and serve hot.

name: Cucumber Raita
steps: Mix well and chill before serving.

name: Bara (Lentil Patties)
steps: Grind soaked lentils to make a thick paste.
Add onion, ginger, chili, and salt.
Form patties and deep-fry until golden.
Serve as a snack or with achar.

name: Hummus
steps: Serve drizzled with olive oil and paprika.

name: Tom Yum Soup
steps: Boil broth with lemongrass and lime leaves.
Add shrimp and mushrooms, cook 5 mins.
Stir in fish sauce, lime juice, chili paste.

name: Baked Mac and Cheese
steps: Make roux with butter and flour. Add milk.
Stir until thick. Add cheese, salt, pepper.
Mix in macaroni. Pour into dish and bake 20 mins.

name: Aloo Paratha
steps: Make dough with flour and water. Rest 30 mins.
Mix potatoes with spices for stuffing.
Roll dough, stuff with potato, and flatten again.
Cook on tawa with ghee until golden on both sides.

name: Kheer
steps: Boil milk and add rinsed rice.
Cook on low heat, stirring often, until thick.
Add sugar and cardamom. Cook 5 more mins.
Garnish with nuts. Serve warm or cold.

name: Tandoori Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in all ingredients for 4 hours.
Grill or bake at 200°C until charred and cooked through.
Serve with onion slices and mint chutney.

name: Chicken Satay
steps: Soak bamboo skewers in water for 30 minutes
Marinate chicken in coconut milk, turmeric and coriander for 1 hour
Mix peanut butter, soy sauce and honey for dipping sauce

name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Heat broth in a saucepan and keep simmering
Sauté onions in olive oil until translucent
Add mushrooms and cook until browned
Add rice and toast for 2 minutes
Pour in wine and cook until absorbed
Add broth 1/2 cup at a time, stirring until absorbed
Cook until rice is creamy (about 20 minutes)
Stir in butter and Parmesan before serving

name: Beef Stir Fry
steps: Marinate beef in 1 tbsp soy sauce and cornstarch for 15 minutes
Heat oil in wok over high heat
Stir-fry beef until browned (2-3 minutes), remove from wok
Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes
Add remaining soy sauce and oyster sauce
Toss everything together and serve hot

name: Shakshuka
steps: Heat oil in skillet, sauté onions until soft
Add bell peppers and garlic, cook 3 minutes
Stir in spices and cook 1 minute
Add tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes
Make wells in sauce and crack eggs into them
Cover and cook until egg whites set (5-7 minutes)
Garnish with parsley and serve with bread

name: Ratatouille
steps: Salt eggplant and let sit 15 minutes, then rinse
Heat oil in large pot, sauté onions until translucent
Add eggplant, zucchini and herbs, cook 5 minutes
Stir in tomatoes and simmer 20 minutes
Season with salt and pepper before serving

name: Lamb Rogan Josh
steps: Marinate lamb in yogurt and 1 tbsp chili powder for 1 hour
Heat oil in heavy pot, add fennel seeds
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook 2 minutes
Add lamb with marinade and remaining spices
Add 1 cup water, cover and simmer 1.5 hours
Garnish with fresh coriander before serving

name: Caprese Salad
steps: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on plate
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze

name: Beef Bulgogi
steps: Combine pear, soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, garlic and ginger
Marinate beef in mixture for at least 1 hour
Garnish with sesame seeds and spring onions

name: Gazpacho
steps: Serve cold garnished with diced vegetables

name: Chicken Enchiladas
steps: Sauté onions in oil until soft
Mix chicken, onions, cumin and 1/4 cup cheese
Dip tortillas in warm enchilada sauce
Fill with chicken mixture and roll up
Place in baking dish, cover with remaining sauce and cheese

name: Pumpkin Soup
steps: Sauté onions and carrots in oil until soft

name: Beef Tacos
steps: Brown beef in oil over medium heat
Add taco seasoning and water according to packet
Heat taco shells according to package
Top with lettuce, tomato, cheese and sour cream

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, carrots, snap peas)
steps: Heat vegetable oil in wok over high heat
Add garlic and ginger, stir 30 seconds
Mix soy sauce, rice vinegar and sugar
Drizzle with sesame oil before serving

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
steps: Sauté onion, garlic, carrots and celery in oil until soft
Simmer for 20 minutes until chicken is cooked
Remove chicken, shred and return to pot

name: Beef Lasagna
steps: Cook noodles according to package, drain
Brown beef with onions and garlic
Add marinara sauce and simmer 10 minutes
Bake covered 25 minutes, uncover and bake 15 more

name: Chicken Pot Pie
steps: Sauté onions in butter until soft
Stir in flour and cook 1 minute
Gradually whisk in broth and milk
Add chicken and vegetables, simmer until thickened
Cover with puff pastry, cut vents

name: Vegetable Curry
steps: Heat oil, sauté onions until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste and spices, cook 1 minute
Add tomato puree, cook until oil separates
Simmer 20 minutes until vegetables are tender

name: Beef Bourguignon
steps: Brown bacon in Dutch oven, remove
Sear beef in bacon fat, remove
Add garlic and tomato paste, cook 1 minute
Return meat and bacon to pot
Add wine and broth, bring to simmer
Cover and cook in 160°C (325°F) oven for 3 hours

name: Falafel
steps: Process all ingredients in food processor
Fry in hot oil until golden brown
Serve in pita with tahini sauce

name: Clam Chowder
steps: Sauté onions and celery in butter until soft
Stir in flour and cook 2 minutes
Gradually whisk in broth and reserved clam juice

name: Chicken Katsu
steps: Set up breading station: flour, eggs, panko
Dredge chicken in flour, then egg, then panko
Fry in 180°C (350°F) oil until golden and cooked
Slice and serve over rice with tonkatsu sauce

name: Lentil Soup
steps: Sauté onion, carrots and celery in oil until soft
Simmer 20-25 minutes until lentils are soft

name: Pork Schnitzel
steps: Set up breading station: flour, eggs, breadcrumbs
Dredge pork in flour, then egg, then breadcrumbs
Fry in hot oil 3-4 minutes per side

name: Miso Soup
steps: Soak wakame in water for 10 minutes, drain
Heat dashi stock to simmer (not boil)
Dissolve miso paste in small amount of stock

name: Beef Pho
ingredients: Bean sprouts, basil, lime for serving
steps: Simmer broth with onion, ginger, star anise and cinnamon for 30 minutes
Cook rice noodles according to package
Strain broth and return to pot
Pour hot broth over beef to cook it
Serve with bean sprouts, basil and lime

name: Spanakopita
steps: Add spinach and cook until wilted, drain excess liquid
Mix spinach with feta, eggs and dill
Layer 8 sheets phyllo, brushing each with butter
Top with 8 more buttered phyllo sheets

name: Jambalaya
steps: Brown chicken and sausage in large pot, remove
Sauté onion, bell pepper and celery until soft
Add rice and Cajun seasoning, stir 2 minutes
Return meat to pot, add broth
Bring to boil, reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes
Add shrimp and cook 5 more minutes

name: Chicken Parmesan
steps: Dip chicken in egg, then breadcrumb-Parmesan mixture
Pan-fry in oil until golden, 4-5 minutes per side
Place in baking dish, top with sauce and mozzarella

name: Vegetable Tempura
ingredients: Assorted vegetables (sweet potato, zucchini, bell peppers)
steps: Mix tempura flour with ice water (lumps are okay)
Fry in small batches until golden

name: Lamb Kofta
ingredients: Pita bread and tzatziki for serving
steps: Mix all ingredients except pita and tzatziki
Form into sausage shapes around skewers
Grill or broil 8-10 minutes, turning occasionally
Serve in pita with tzatziki and salad

name: Chicken Adobo
steps: Combine chicken, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaves and peppercorns
Bring to boil, then simmer 30 minutes
Return to sauce and simmer 10 minutes

name: Pulled Pork Sandwiches
steps: Season pork with salt and pepper
Sear on all sides in hot pan
Place in slow cooker with onion, garlic and broth
Shred pork, mix with BBQ sauce

name: Tuna Poke Bowl
steps: Mix tuna with soy sauce, sesame oil and ginger
Arrange avocado, edamame and cucumber around tuna

name: Beef Wellington
steps: Sear beef on all sides, cool completely
Lay prosciutto slices on plastic wrap
Place beef on top and roll tightly
Wrap in puff pastry, brush with egg wash

name: Chicken Cacciatore
steps: Sauté onions and peppers until soft
Pour in wine and reduce by half
Add tomato sauce and return chicken to pan
Simmer 30 minutes until chicken is tender

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Cream butter and sugars until fluffy
Beat in eggs one at a time

name: Beef Rendang
steps: Heat oil, sauté rendang paste 2 minutes
Add beef and brown on all sides
Add coconut milk, lemongrass and lime leaves
Add tamarind and sugar in last 30 minutes
Cook until sauce thickens and coats beef

name: Chicken Shawarma
steps: Mix oil, lemon juice, garlic and spices
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked
Serve chicken in pita with tahini sauce and salad

name: Vegetable Paella
steps: Steep saffron in 2 tbsp warm broth
Sauté onion and bell pepper until soft

name: Pork Dumplings
steps: Mix pork, cabbage, onions, ginger, soy sauce and sesame oil
Place teaspoon filling in wrapper center

name: Eggplant Parmesan
steps: Salt eggplant slices, let sit 30 minutes, rinse and pat dry
Brush with oil and roast at 200°C (400°F) 20 minutes
Dip slices in egg, then breadcrumbs
Layer in baking dish: sauce, eggplant, cheeses

name: Lamb Biryani
steps: Marinate lamb in yogurt and 1 tbsp masala for 1 hour
Fry onions in ghee until golden, remove half
Layer rice and lamb in heavy pot
Top with fried onions, saffron milk and herbs
Cover and cook on low 30 minutes

name: Crab Cakes
steps: Pan-fry in oil 4-5 minutes per side
Serve with lemon wedges and remoulade

name: Pork Vindaloo
steps: Blend onions, garlic and ginger to paste

name: Chicken Fajitas
steps: Sauté peppers and onions with remaining seasoning
Serve with salsa, guacamole and sour cream

name: Beetroot Salad
steps: Combine olive oil and balsamic vinegar
Top with beetroot, feta and walnuts

name: Salmon Teriyaki
steps: Mix soy sauce, mirin, sake, sugar and ginger for sauce

name: Lamb Chops
steps: Rub chops with oil, garlic, rosemary, salt and pepper
Grill or pan-sear 3-4 minutes per side

name: Apple Pie
steps: Mix apples, sugar, cinnamon, flour and lemon juice
Line pie dish with one crust
Cover with second crust, seal edges

name: Vegetable Biryani
steps: Sauté onions in ghee until golden
Add vegetables and biryani masala, cook 5 minutes
Layer rice and vegetables in pot
Top with saffron milk and coriander
Cover and cook on low 20 minutes

name: Shrimp Scampi
steps: Heat oil and butter, sauté garlic 1 minute
Add shrimp and cook until pink
Add wine and lemon juice, simmer 2 minutes

name: Chicken Curry
steps: Heat oil, sauté curry paste 1 minute
Add coconut milk and simmer 15 minutes
Add bell pepper, fish sauce and sugar

name: Greek Salad
steps: Whisk oil and vinegar with oregano

name: Beef Tacos
steps: Add seasoning and water, simmer 5 minutes
Heat taco shells according to package
Serve with sour cream and salsa

name: Boiled Water
steps: Pour water into a pot or kettle.
Heat on medium-high until it reaches a rolling boil.

name: Masala Chai
steps: Boil water with spices and ginger for 2–3 minutes.
Add tea leaves and simmer 1 minute.
Pour in milk and sugar; bring to a boil.

name: Scrambled Eggs
steps: Crack eggs into a bowl, add milk, salt, and pepper. Whisk well.
Heat butter in a pan over medium heat.
Pour egg mixture and stir gently until just set.

name: Vegetable Sandwich
steps: Layer potato, cucumber, and tomato slices. Sprinkle chaat masala.
Cover with another slice of bread.

name: Avocado Toast
steps: Toast bread slices to desired crispness.
Mash avocado with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Spread on toast and sprinkle chili flakes.

name: Banana Smoothie
steps: Blend banana, milk, and honey until smooth.
Add ice cubes if desired and blend again.

name: Garlic Bread
steps: Slice baguette and preheat oven to 180°C.
Bake for 10 minutes or until golden.

name: Poached Egg
steps: Bring water to a simmer in a pot.
Create a gentle whirlpool in the water.
Slide egg into the center and poach for 3–4 minutes.
Remove with slotted spoon and serve.

name: Stir-Fried Tofu
steps: Add garlic and tofu; stir-fry until golden.
Add soy sauce and mix well.
Garnish with spring onions and serve hot.

name: Pita Bread
steps: Mix flour, yeast, salt, water, and oil into a dough.
Knead for 5–7 minutes and let rise 1 hour.
Bake at 230°C for 5–7 minutes until puffed.

name: Omelette
steps: Whisk eggs, milk, salt, and pepper together.
Heat butter in a non-stick pan.
Pour the mixture and cook on medium heat.
Add chopped veggies if using. Fold when set.

name: Vegetable Upma
steps: Dry roast semolina and keep aside.
Heat oil, splutter mustard seeds, sauté onions and chili.
Add water and salt, bring to boil.
Stir in semolina, mix till thick. Serve hot.

name: Bulgur Salad (Tabbouleh)
steps: Soak bulgur in hot water for 20 minutes.
Drain excess water, fluff with fork.
Mix with herbs, tomatoes, olive oil, and lemon juice.
Season with salt. Chill before serving.

name: Classic Pancakes
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk milk, egg, and butter in another bowl.
Combine wet and dry mixtures into smooth batter.
Pour onto hot greased pan, flip when bubbles form.

name: Coconut Rice
steps: Heat oil, add mustard seeds, chili, and urad dal.
Mix with rice and add salt.

name: Margherita Pizza
steps: Roll dough into circle, spread tomato sauce
Top with fresh basil before serving

name: Chicken Fried Rice
steps: Stir-fry chicken until cooked, set aside
Scramble eggs in same pan, remove
Add rice, chicken, eggs and soy sauce

name: Rajma Masala
steps: Add tomato puree and spices, cook 5 minutes

name: Sukuti Curry
steps: Soak sukuti in water 30 minutes, drain
Heat oil, fry potatoes until golden, remove
Add tomatoes and spices, cook until soft
Add sukuti and 1 cup water, simmer 20 minutes

name: French Onion Soup
steps: Deglaze with wine, reduce by half
Ladle soup into bowls, top with bread and cheese

name: Dahi Puri
steps: Make small hole in each puri
Top with yogurt and tamarind chutney

name: Chicken Wings
steps: Pat wings dry, season with salt
Mix hot sauce, butter and spices

name: Dhal Puri
steps: Make dough with flour and water
Mix peas with spices for filling
Roll dough balls, stuff with filling

name: Sushi Rolls
steps: Arrange fish and vegetables on one end
Slice into 8 pieces with wet knife
Serve with soy sauce and wasabi

name: Lamb Momos
steps: Mix lamb, onion, ginger-garlic paste, timur and salt

name: Beef Stroganoff
steps: Dust beef with flour, sear in butter

name: Aloo Paratha
steps: Make dough with flour and water
Mash potatoes with cumin and chili
Roll dough, stuff with potato mixture
Flatten and cook on tawa with ghee

name: Bara
steps: Mix with meat, ginger and chili

name: Rasmalai
steps: Boil milk, add lemon juice to curdle
Reduce milk to half, add cardamom

name: Pizza
steps: Spread tomato sauce evenly over the pizza base.
Top with cheese, vegetables, and olives.
Bake for 10–12 minutes until cheese melts and crust is golden.

name: Chicken Chilly
steps: Mix chicken with flours, egg, salt, and pepper.
In a pan, heat 1 tbsp oil. Sauté garlic, onions, capsicum, and chilies.
Add sauces and stir for 1 minute.
Add fried chicken; toss to coat.
Serve hot as an appetizer or with fried rice.

name: Lasagna
steps: Cook lasagna sheets as per package instructions; drain and set aside.
Heat oil; sauté onion and garlic. Add beef, cook until browned.
Add marinara sauce, salt, and pepper. Simmer 10 minutes.
Layer in a baking dish: sauce, sheets, ricotta, mozzarella. Repeat.
Cool slightly before slicing and serving.

name: Mo:Mo Jhol
steps: Sauté onion until translucent. Add ginger-garlic paste and spices.
Add tomatoes and cook until mushy. Pour in water and bring to boil.
Simmer for 10 minutes to make thin soup.
Add steamed momos and simmer 2 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve hot.

name: Butter Naan
steps: Dissolve sugar and yeast in warm water. Wait 10 minutes until frothy.
Mix flour, yogurt, yeast mixture to form soft dough. Rest 2 hours.
Divide into balls, roll into ovals.
Cook on hot tawa until bubbles appear. Flip and cook.
Brush with butter and serve hot.

name: Margherita Pizza
steps: Spread sauce on pizza base. Top with cheese.
Bake 12-15 minutes until crust is golden.
Top with fresh basil and drizzle olive oil.

name: Chow Mein
steps: Heat oil in wok. Add garlic and stir-fry 30 seconds.
Add vegetables and cook on high heat 3 minutes.
Add noodles, soy sauce, and chili sauce.
Garnish with spring onions and serve.

name: Buffalo Wings
steps: Deep-fry wings until golden and crispy. Drain.
Mix hot sauce, butter, and garlic powder.
Serve with blue cheese dip and celery sticks.

name: Pani Puri
steps: Fill with mashed potatoes and chickpeas.
Add tamarind chutney and mint water.

name: Sekuwa
steps: In a bowl, mix meat with all spices, oil, and lemon juice.
Marinate for at least 2 hours (overnight preferred).
Grill over charcoal or bake in an oven at 200°C for 20–25 minutes, turning occasionally.
Serve hot with achar or beaten rice.

name: Aalu Ko Achar
steps: Heat mustard oil and fry fenugreek seeds until black. Add turmeric and pour over potatoes.
Add chili powder, green chilies, timur, salt, and lemon juice/yogurt.
Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and serve.

name: Burger
steps: Heat oil/butter in a pan and cook patties until browned and cooked through.
Spread mayonnaise and ketchup on the bun halves.
Place patty, cheese, lettuce, tomato, and cucumber on the bottom bun.
Sprinkle salt and pepper if needed.
Cover with the top bun and serve hot.

name: Sapu Micha
steps: Clean the buffalo tripe thoroughly and cut into 2x2 inch square pieces.
Place a small amount of bone marrow in the center of each tripe square and fold it into a pouch.
Tie the open end with a string or sew with a toothpick to seal the marrow inside.
Boil the pouches in salted water with turmeric for about 15–20 minutes until half cooked.
Drain and marinate with ginger-garlic paste, cumin, coriander, chili powder, lemon juice, and salt.
Heat oil in a pan and deep fry the sapu micha until golden and crisp.
Serve hot as a delicacy or appetizer during feasts.

name: Roti
ingredients: 2 tsp oil or ghee (optional, for softness)
steps: In a bowl, mix flour and salt (if using).
Gradually add water and knead into a soft, smooth dough.
Cover and let it rest for 20–30 minutes.
Divide dough into small balls and roll each into a thin, round disc using extra flour.
Heat a flat pan or tawa on medium-high.
Place a rolled roti on the hot pan. Cook for about 30 seconds until bubbles form, then flip.
Cook the other side until light brown spots appear, then flip again and gently press to puff it up.
Apply ghee or butter if desired. Serve hot with curry or vegetables.

name: Raita
ingredients: 1/2 cup cucumber, grated or finely chopped
steps: Whisk the yogurt in a bowl until smooth.
Add chopped cucumber, tomato, onion, and green chili (as preferred).
Mix in salt and roasted cumin powder.
Stir well to combine all ingredients.
Serve chilled as a side dish with pulao, biryani, or paratha.

name: Croissant
steps: In a bowl, mix warm milk, sugar, and yeast. Let it sit for 5–10 minutes until foamy.
Add flour, salt, and 1 tbsp soft butter. Mix and knead into a soft dough.
Cover and let it rise for 1 hour or until doubled.
Roll the dough into a rectangle. Place cold butter slab (flattened between parchment) in the center.
Fold dough over butter (like a letter) and roll out gently.
Repeat folding and rolling 3 times, chilling for 30 minutes between each fold.
After final fold, chill dough for at least 1 hour.
Roll out dough into a large rectangle. Cut into triangles.
Roll each triangle from the base to form croissants. Curve tips to shape.
Place on a baking sheet, cover, and proof for 1–2 hours until puffy.
Brush with egg wash. Bake at 200°C (390°F) for 15–20 minutes until golden brown.

name: Vanilla Sponge Cake
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F). Grease a cake pan.
Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well.
Sift flour, baking powder, and salt together. Add to wet mixture alternately with milk.
Pour batter into pan and bake for 30–35 minutes.

name: Chocolate Cake
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F). Grease two round pans.
Combine dry ingredients in a bowl.
Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla. Beat for 2 minutes.
Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin).
Pour into pans and bake for 30–35 minutes.

name: Classic Cheesecake
steps: Mix crushed crackers and butter. Press into springform pan.
Beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth.
Add eggs one at a time, then vanilla and sour cream.
Pour over crust and bake at 160°C (325°F) for 50–60 minutes.
Cool and chill for 4 hours before serving.

name: Strawberry Shortcake
steps: Mix strawberries with sugar and set aside.
Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F). Mix dry ingredients.
Cut in butter until crumbly. Add milk to form dough.
Roll out and cut into rounds. Bake for 12–15 minutes.
Split shortcakes, fill with strawberries and whipped cream.

name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
steps: Melt butter in pan. Sprinkle brown sugar. Place pineapple and cherries.
Mix remaining ingredients into smooth batter.
Pour over fruit and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 35–40 minutes.
Cool slightly and invert to serve.

name: Red Velvet Cake
steps: Mix dry ingredients. In another bowl, whisk eggs, oil, buttermilk, food coloring, vanilla, and vinegar.
Cool and frost with cream cheese frosting.

name: Banana Cake
steps: Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and beat.
Add mashed bananas, milk, and vanilla.
Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt.
Pour into pan and bake 45–50 minutes.

name: Carrot Cake
steps: Mix dry ingredients. In another bowl, beat sugars, oil, and eggs.
Combine dry and wet mixtures. Fold in carrots and nuts.
Pour into pan and bake for 40–50 minutes.
Cool and frost with cream cheese frosting.

name: Lemon Drizzle Cake
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F). Grease loaf pan.
Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs one at a time.
Mix in flour, baking powder, salt, and milk.
Pour into pan and bake for 45–50 minutes.
Drizzle lemon-sugar glaze on top while warm.

name: Black Forest Cake
ingredients: Whipped cream for filling and topping
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F). Grease two pans.
Mix dry ingredients. Add eggs, oil, vanilla, and buttermilk.
Pour batter into pans and bake for 30–35 minutes.
Cool, then layer with whipped cream and cherries.
Frost with cream and top with chocolate shavings and cherries.

name: Rasbari
ingredients: 2 tbsp lemon juice or vinegar (for curdling)
Rose water or kewra essence (optional, a few drops)
steps: Boil milk in a heavy pan. Once it boils, reduce heat and add lemon juice or vinegar to curdle the milk.
Stir until the whey separates completely. Turn off heat.
Strain the curdled milk (chhena) using a muslin cloth. Rinse under cold water to remove sourness.
Squeeze out excess water and hang for 30 minutes to drain completely.
Knead the chhena on a plate for 8–10 minutes until smooth and soft.
Make small, smooth balls from the dough (about 12–14).
Boil water and sugar in a wide pan. Add cardamom pods if using.
Once syrup boils, gently drop the balls in and cover the lid.
Cook on medium-high heat for 12–15 minutes. The balls will puff and double in size.
Turn off heat, cool, and optionally add rose water or kewra.

name: Gulab Jamun
ingredients: 1/4 cup milk (as needed to form dough)
Oil or ghee for deep frying
1 tsp rose water or a few drops of kewra essence (optional)
Sliced pistachios or almonds for garnish (optional)
steps: In a bowl, mix milk powder, flour, and baking soda.
Add ghee and mix well. Gradually add milk and knead gently into a soft, smooth dough.
Meanwhile, prepare sugar syrup: boil sugar, water, and cardamom pods until slightly sticky. Add rose water or kewra if using. Keep warm.
Divide dough into small balls without cracks.
Heat oil/ghee on medium-low. Fry balls slowly until golden brown, turning gently.
Remove and drain briefly, then soak in warm sugar syrup for at least 1–2 hours.
Garnish with nuts and serve warm or chilled.

name: Milk Tea
ingredients: 1 to 1.5 tsp black tea leaves or 1 tea bag
2 cardamom pods or 1 small piece ginger (optional)
steps: In a saucepan, bring water to a boil.
Add tea leaves (or tea bag) and optional spices like cardamom or ginger.
Boil for 1–2 minutes to let flavors infuse.
Add milk and sugar. Stir well.
Bring the tea to a gentle boil again, then simmer for 2–3 minutes.
Strain into a cup and serve hot.

name: Black Tea
ingredients: 1 to 1.5 tsp black tea leaves or 1 black tea bag
steps: Add black tea leaves or a tea bag to the boiling water.
Add sugar if desired and let it simmer for 2–3 minutes.
Optional: Add cardamom or a slice of lemon for flavor.
Turn off heat and strain the tea into a cup.

name: Lemon Tea
ingredients: 1 to 1.5 tsp black tea leaves or 1 tea bag
steps: Add black tea leaves or tea bag and simmer for 2–3 minutes.
Add sugar if desired and stir well.
Pour tea into a cup and add a slice of lemon.

name: Espresso
steps: Fill the espresso machine portafilter with finely ground coffee and tamp it firmly.
Lock the portafilter in the machine.
Start the machine to extract the coffee shot for about 25-30 seconds.
Serve immediately as a small, strong shot of coffee.

name: Cappuccino
steps: Prepare a shot of espresso and pour into a cup.
Steam the milk to create hot milk and thick foam.
Pour the steamed milk over the espresso, followed by the milk foam.
Serve immediately, optionally dust with cocoa powder.

name: Latte
ingredients: A thin layer of milk foam
steps: Prepare a shot of espresso and pour into a tall glass.
Steam milk until hot and lightly frothy.
Pour steamed milk into the espresso, holding back most foam with a spoon.
Top with a thin layer of milk foam.

name: Cold Brew Coffee
steps: Combine ground coffee and cold water in a large jar or pitcher.
Let steep in the refrigerator for 12-24 hours.
Strain the coffee concentrate through a fine mesh or coffee filter.
Serve over ice, dilute with water or milk as desired.

name: Hot Rum Punch
steps: In a small pot, combine water, sugar (or honey), cinnamon stick, cloves, and star anise.
Bring to a simmer and stir until sugar dissolves.
Remove from heat and add rum and lime juice.
Garnish with an orange slice and a pinch of nutmeg.

name: Whisky (Neat or On the Rocks)
steps: Serve neat (without ice) or add ice cubes for 'on the rocks'.

name: Whisky Sour
steps: Fill a shaker with whisky, lemon juice, simple syrup, and ice.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with lemon slice or cherry.

name: Beer
steps: Chill the beer in the refrigerator or cooler.
Pour beer gently into a chilled glass at an angle to reduce foam.

name: Shandy (Beer Cocktail)
steps: Fill a glass halfway with beer.
Top up with lemonade or lemon-lime soda.

name: Vodka (Neat or With Mixers)
ingredients: Optional mixers: soda water, tonic water, orange juice, cranberry juice
steps: Serve neat (without mixers) or add ice and your choice of mixer.
Stir gently if mixed, and enjoy.

name: Vodka Martini
steps: Fill a mixing glass with vodka, vermouth, and ice.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist or olive.

name: Jalebi
ingredients: 1/4 tsp saffron strands or yellow food color (optional)
Oil or ghee for deep frying
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, cornstarch, baking powder, yogurt, and water to make a smooth batter.
Cover and ferment the batter for 8-12 hours or overnight.
Prepare sugar syrup by boiling sugar and water until one-string consistency is achieved. Add saffron or food color and cardamom powder; keep warm.
Heat oil in a wide pan for deep frying.
Pour batter into a squeeze bottle or cloth with a small hole.
Squeeze batter in circular spirals into hot oil. Fry until golden and crisp.
Immediately transfer fried jalebis into warm sugar syrup. Soak for 1-2 minutes.
Remove and drain excess syrup. Serve warm.

name: Gwarmari
ingredients: 1 cup finely chopped green onions (spring onions)
steps: In a bowl, mix flour and salt. Gradually add warm water and knead into a smooth, soft dough.
Cover the dough and let it rest for 30 minutes.
In another bowl, combine chopped green onions, cumin seeds, and chili powder.
Divide the dough into small balls. Roll each ball into a small circle.
Place some green onion mixture in the center, fold and seal the edges.
Heat oil in a deep pan for frying.
Deep fry the stuffed dough pieces until golden brown and crispy.
Drain on paper towels and serve warm with chutney or achar.

name: Haluwa
steps: Heat ghee in a pan over medium heat. Add semolina and roast, stirring continuously, until golden brown and aromatic.
In a separate pot, boil water with sugar until sugar dissolves completely.
Slowly add the hot sugar water to the roasted semolina, stirring continuously to avoid lumps.
Cook on low heat until the mixture thickens and semolina is cooked through.
Add cardamom powder, saffron (if using), and chopped nuts. Mix well.
Remove from heat and let it cool slightly before serving.
Serve warm as a dessert or snack.

name: Fish and Chips
ingredients: 4 white fish fillets (cod, haddock, or pollock)
1 cup cold beer or sparkling water
4 large potatoes, peeled and cut into thick fries
Oil for deep frying (vegetable or canola)
Lemon wedges and tartar sauce (for serving)
steps: Heat oil in a deep fryer or large pot to 180°C (350°F).
Rinse and pat dry fish fillets. Season with salt and pepper.
Mix flour, baking powder, salt, and pepper. Gradually whisk in beer or sparkling water to form a smooth batter.
Dip fish into the batter, then carefully lower into hot oil. Fry until golden and crispy, about 4-5 minutes. Remove and drain.
Fry the potato fries in batches until golden and crisp, about 5-7 minutes. Drain on paper towels and season with salt.
Serve fish and chips hot with lemon wedges and tartar sauce.

name: Fries
ingredients: Oil for deep frying (vegetable or canola)
steps: Peel and cut potatoes into evenly sized sticks.
Rinse potato sticks in cold water to remove excess starch.
Soak the cut potatoes in cold water for at least 30 minutes (or up to 2 hours). Drain and pat dry thoroughly.
Heat oil in a deep fryer or large pot to 160°C (320°F).
Fry potatoes in batches for about 4-5 minutes until soft but not browned. Remove and drain.
Increase oil temperature to 190°C (375°F). Fry potatoes again in batches until golden brown and crispy, about 2-3 minutes.
Drain on paper towels and immediately season with salt.
Serve hot with ketchup or your favorite dipping sauce.

name: Pork Vindaloo
steps: Marinate pork in vindaloo paste and vinegar for 2 hours
Heat oil, sauté onions until golden brown
Add ginger and garlic, cook for 2 minutes
Add marinated pork and brown on all sides
Pour water, cover and simmer for 1.5 hours

name: Tofu Katsu Curry
steps: Press tofu to remove water, slice into cutlets
Dredge tofu in flour, egg, then panko
Sauté vegetables in pot until soft
Add broth and curry roux, simmer until thickened
Serve tofu over rice with curry sauce

name: Mushroom Wellington
steps: Sauté mushrooms in oil until tender
Roll out pastry, spread mustard layer
Layer spinach, mushrooms, onions and walnuts
Wrap pastry tightly, brush with egg wash

name: Jerk Chicken
steps: Blend all marinade ingredients into paste
Grill chicken over medium heat 20 minutes per side
Baste with reserved marinade while cooking

name: Duck Confit
steps: Salt duck legs and refrigerate overnight
Melt duck fat in oven-safe dish
Submerge duck in fat with aromatics
Crisp skin in skillet before serving

name: Kimchi Jjigae
steps: Add kimchi and cook for 5 minutes
Pour stock and bring to boil
Add tofu and green onions, cook 5 more minutes

name: Lobster Thermidor
steps: Sauté shallots and mushrooms in butter
Whisk in milk and brandy until thickened
Stir in lobster meat and mustard
Fill shells, top with cheese, broil until golden

name: Quiche Lorraine
steps: Prebake pie crust at 180°C for 10 minutes
Cook bacon until crisp, drain fat
Whisk eggs, cream, nutmeg, salt and pepper
Layer bacon, onions and cheese in crust

name: Ceviche
steps: Cube fish, marinate in lime juice 15 minutes
Rinse onions in cold water, drain
Mix fish with onions, chili and cilantro
Serve with slices of sweet potato and corn

name: Bibimbap
steps: Marinate beef in soy sauce and sesame oil
Assemble rice in bowl, arrange vegetables and beef

name: Chicken Piccata
steps: Pound chicken thin, dredge in flour
Deglaze pan with wine and lemon juice
Add stock and capers, reduce by half
Return chicken to sauce, simmer 5 minutes

name: Beef Empanadas
steps: Make dough with flour, lard and water
Brown beef with onions and cumin
Chop eggs and olives, mix with beef
Fill with meat mixture, seal edges

name: Miso Glazed Eggplant
steps: Mix miso, mirin, sake and sugar
Garnish with sesame seeds and scallions

name: Lamb Tagine
steps: Pour stock, cover and simmer 1.5 hours
Add apricots and cook 30 more minutes

name: Pumpkin Ravioli
steps: Brush edges with water, cover with second wrapper
Brown butter with sage, toss with ravioli

name: Cajun Shrimp Pasta
steps: Sauté shrimp with Cajun seasoning, remove
Add cream and reduce by half
Return shrimp and pasta to sauce

name: Chicken Korma
steps: Blend cashews with water to make paste
Sauté onion paste in ghee until golden

name: Beetroot Risotto
steps: Puree roasted beets with 1/2 cup stock
Add stock 1/2 cup at a time, stirring
Stir in beet puree, butter and Parmesan

name: Pork Belly Buns
steps: Rub pork with five-spice and soy sauce
Fill with pork, cucumber and onions

name: Salmon en Papillote
steps: Top with salmon, lemon and dill

name: Churrasco Steak
steps: Rub steaks with salt, pepper and garlic
Grill over high heat 3 minutes per side

name: Duck Fried Rice
steps: Score duck skin, pan-sear until crispy
Add rice and sauces, toss well
Add duck and eggs, mix gently

name: Venison Stew
steps: Pour stock and wine, add herbs

name: Okonomiyaki
steps: Mix flour, eggs and dashi into batter
Pour batter on griddle, top with bacon

name: Lobster Roll
steps: Mix with mayo, lemon juice and celery

name: Chicken Mole
steps: Toast chilies, soak in hot water
Blend chilies with all sauce ingredients

name: Scallop Crudo
steps: Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice
Sprinkle salt, chili and lemon zest

name: Wild Mushroom Galette
steps: Sauté mushrooms with shallots and garlic
Stir in crème fraîche and thyme
Brush crust with egg wash, sprinkle cheese

name: Honey Glazed Duck
steps: Glaze duck every 10 minutes while roasting

name: Lentil Kofta
steps: Mix with bulgur, onion and spices

name: Octopus Salad
steps: Whisk lemon juice and olive oil

name: Stuffed Artichokes
steps: Mix breadcrumbs, cheese, garlic and parsley

name: Venison Sausages
steps: Grind venison and pork fat together
Crush spices, mix with meat and wine
Grill or pan-fry until cooked through

name: Pomegranate Molasses Chicken
steps: Mix molasses, onion, honey and saffron
Garnish with pomegranate seeds and nuts

name: Scallop Ceviche
steps: Serve with sweet potato and corn

name: Goat Cheese Soufflé
steps: Make béchamel with butter, flour and milk
Beat whites with cream of tartar to stiff peaks

name: Tuna Niçoise
steps: Boil eggs, potatoes and beans separately

name: Squid Ink Pasta
steps: Sauté garlic and chili in oil

name: Crawfish Étouffée
steps: Make roux with butter and flour

name: Manti
steps: Mix lamb and onion for filling
Serve with yogurt and mint oil

name: Venison Carpaccio
steps: Garnish with capers, drizzle truffle oil

name: Scorpion Fish Soup
steps: Add fish and cover with water

name: Monkfish Curry
steps: Sauté curry paste in coconut cream
Season with fish sauce and sugar

name: Quail Stuffed with Foie Gras
steps: Make foie gras and truffle mousse
Deglaze pan with Madeira for sauce

name: Kangaroo Fillet
steps: Rub fillets with wattleseed and rosemary
Drizzle with jus, side of chutney

name: Bearnaise Sauce
steps: Reduce vinegar with shallots and tarragon
Whisk yolks with reduction over double boiler

name: Mashed Potatoes
steps: Sauté garlic in butter until fragrant
Drain potatoes and mash with garlic butter
Gradually add warm milk while mashing

name: Mango Lassi
steps: Blend mango, yogurt and milk until smooth
Add honey and cardamom, blend again
Garnish with mint leaf if desired

name: Honey Glazed Carrots
steps: Melt butter in skillet over medium heat
Add honey and thyme, stir to combine
Add carrots and toss to coat

name: Blueberry Pancakes
steps: In separate bowl, mix buttermilk, egg and butter
Combine wet and dry ingredients gently
Pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake on hot griddle
Flip when bubbles form (2-3 mins per side)

name: Lemon Herb Roasted Chicken
steps: Pat chicken dry and season cavity
Rub skin with olive oil and lemon juice
Stuff cavity with lemon slices and garlic
Roast 1.5 hours until golden and juices run clear

name: Cucumber Mint Raita
steps: Mix cucumber and mint into yogurt
Add cumin and salt, stir well

name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Sauté mushrooms in olive oil, set aside
Cook onions in butter until translucent
Pour in wine, cook until absorbed
Add warm broth 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly
When rice is creamy, stir in mushrooms and Parmesan

name: Banana Bread
steps: Mix bananas, butter and sugar in bowl
Sift in flour and baking soda, mix gently
Pour into greased loaf pan, bake 50-60 minutes

name: Tomato Basil Bruschetta
steps: Combine tomatoes, basil and garlic in bowl
Add vinegar and olive oil, toss gently
Let sit 15 minutes for flavors to blend
Spoon mixture onto toasted bread slices
Drizzle with extra olive oil before serving

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Whisk flour and baking soda together
Cream butter and sugars until fluffy
Beat in eggs one at a time, then vanilla

name: Coconut Curry Shrimp
steps: Heat oil, sauté curry paste 1 minute
Add coconut milk, bring to simmer
Stir in shrimp, fish sauce and sugar
Simmer 3-4 minutes until shrimp turn pink

name: Avocado Toast
steps: Toast bread until golden and crisp
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt and pepper
Top with poached eggs if using

name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-fry
steps: Marinate beef in 1 tbsp soy sauce 15 mins
Heat oil, stir-fry garlic and ginger
Add broccoli and sauces, stir-fry 3 mins
Drizzle with sesame oil before serving

name: Berry Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: Toppings: granola, chia seeds, fresh berries
steps: Blend frozen berries, banana and yogurt
Add honey and blend until thick

name: Pumpkin Soup
steps: Sauté onion and carrots in oil until soft
Add pumpkin and broth, simmer 20 mins
Blend until smooth with coconut milk
Season with nutmeg, salt and pepper

name: Cinnamon Apple Oatmeal
steps: Combine oats and liquid in saucepan
Bring to simmer over medium heat
Add apples and cinnamon, cook 5 mins
Stir in maple syrup and salt

name: Caprese Salad
steps: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices alternately
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze

name: Ginger Tea
steps: Boil ginger in water for 10 minutes
Stir in honey and lemon juice

name: Zucchini Noodles
steps: Toss in zucchini noodles, cook 3 mins

name: Honey Mustard Salmon
steps: Mix mustard, honey, oil and lemon zest
Season salmon with salt and pepper
Brush fillets with honey mustard glaze

name: Cauliflower Rice
steps: Pulse in food processor until rice-like
Heat oil, sauté onion and garlic

name: Mint Lemonade
steps: Muddle mint with sugar in pitcher
Add lemon juice and stir until sugar dissolves
Garnish with lemon slices and mint

name: Sweet Potato Fries
steps: Arrange in single layer on baking sheet
Bake 20 minutes, flip, bake 15 more mins
Season with salt, serve with dipping sauce

name: Chia Pudding
steps: Whisk chia seeds and almond milk in jar
Top with fresh berries and nuts

name: Green Bean Almondine
steps: Toast almonds in dry pan until golden

name: Papaya Salad
steps: Pound garlic and chilies in mortar
Add fish sauce, sugar and lime juice
Toss dressing with papaya and carrot
Top with halved tomatoes and peanuts

name: Butternut Squash Soup
steps: Sauté onion in oil until soft
Add apple, roasted squash and broth

name: Oreo Milkshake
steps: Blend remaining cookies with ice cream and milk

name: Bacon Wrapped Asparagus
steps: Toss asparagus with oil and pepper
Wrap each bundle with bacon slice
Place seam-side down on baking sheet

name: Chickpea Salad
steps: Combine chickpeas and vegetables in bowl
Whisk lemon juice and olive oil
Pour dressing over salad, toss gently

name: Pineapple Fried Rice
steps: Heat oil, scramble eggs and set aside
Add rice and curry powder, stir-fry 3 mins
Return eggs to pan, mix well

name: Raspberry Sorbet
steps: Make simple syrup: dissolve sugar in water
Blend raspberries with syrup and lemon juice
Churn in ice cream maker 20 mins

name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
steps: Mix cream cheese, sour cream and mayo
Add spinach, artichokes, garlic and Parmesan
Transfer to baking dish, top with mozzarella

name: Apple Cinnamon Muffins
steps: In separate bowl, whisk wet ingredients
Combine wet and dry mixtures gently

name: Cucumber Sandwich
steps: Spread cream cheese mixture on 4 slices
Trim crusts and cut into triangles

name: Peach Iced Tea
steps: Steep tea bags in boiling water 5 mins

name: Walnut Pesto Pasta
steps: Cook pasta al dente, reserve 1/2 cup water
Blend basil, walnuts, garlic and Parmesan
Toss pesto with pasta and cooking water

name: Corn Fritters
steps: Mix flour, baking powder and salt
Fold in corn and green onions
Drop spoonfuls of batter, fry 3 mins per side

name: Cabbage Kimchi
steps: Cut cabbage into quarters, salt generously
Let sit 2 hours, rinse and drain
Make paste with ginger, garlic, chili, fish sauce and sugar
Pack into jar with green onions

name: Pea and Mint Soup
steps: Sauté onion in oil until soft
Add peas and broth, simmer 10 mins

name: Almond Butter Cookies
steps: Flatten with fork in crisscross pattern

name: Mango Sticky Rice
steps: Heat coconut milk, sugar and salt
Pour half over cooked rice, let absorb 30 mins

name: Pistachio Crusted Fish
steps: Dip in egg, then pistachio mixture

name: Pear and Gorgonzola Salad
steps: Whisk vinegar, oil, salt and pepper

name: Salmon Teriyaki Bowl
steps: Marinate salmon in teriyaki sauce and honey for 15 minutes
Slice salmon and arrange over rice

name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Sauté mushrooms until golden, set aside
Cook onions in butter until translucent

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
steps: Whisk eggs, yolks and sugar until pale
Pour into ramekins, bake at 220°C for 12 minutes
Invert onto plates, dust with cocoa

name: Blueberry Pancakes
steps: Cook on griddle until bubbles form

name: Eggplant Parmesan
steps: Slice eggplant, salt and drain 30 minutes

name: Coconut Curry Shrimp
steps: Add shrimp and cook until pink
Stir in fish sauce and lime juice

name: Lemon Herb Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in lemon juice, garlic, herbs and oil

name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
steps: Add shrimp and cook until pink

name: Apple Crumble
steps: Combine flour, sugar and butter for topping

name: Peach Cobbler
steps: Slice peaches and mix with 1/4 cup sugar
Mix batter and pour over butter

name: Pear Salad
steps: Slice pears and arrange over greens

name: Raspberry Cheesecake
steps: Make crust from crackers and butter
Add eggs one at a time

name: Mint Lemonade
steps: Make simple syrup with sugar and water

name: Date Shake
steps: Soak dates in warm water 10 minutes

name: Plum Galette
steps: Slice plums and toss with sugar and cornstarch

name: Chocolate Mousse
steps: Separate eggs, whip whites with sugar
Gently fold in cream and whites

name: Tomato Bruschetta
steps: Dice tomatoes, mix with basil and oil

name: Beef Wellington
steps: Sear beef on all sides, brush with mustard
Roll puff pastry around beef bundle
Brush with egg wash, score pattern

name: Paella Valenciana
steps: Heat oil in paella pan, brown meats

name: Croissant
steps: Perform 3 letter folds (30 min chill between)
Egg wash, bake at 190°C for 18 minutes

name: Sushi Nigiri
steps: Cook rice, season with vinegar mixture
Form small rice ovals with damp hands
Add dab of wasabi to fish slices

name: Peking Duck
steps: Inflate duck skin, pour boiling water over
Carve thin slices, serve with pancakes and condiments

name: Beef Bourguignon
steps: Brown beef in bacon fat, set aside
Deglaze with wine, reduce by half
Return beef, add stock and herbs

name: Moussaka
steps: Salt eggplant, rinse, and fry slices
Brown lamb with onion and cinnamon
Layer eggplant and meat sauce in dish

name: Feijoada
ingredients: Served with rice, collard greens, farofa
steps: Soak beans and salted meats overnight
Simmer beans with meats for 3 hours
Remove meats, slice, return to pot

name: Baklava
steps: Pour cooled syrup over hot baklava

name: Ceviche
steps: Serve with boiled sweet potato and corn

name: Bibimbap
steps: Place vegetables in sections on rice
Top with beef and fried egg

name: Goulash
steps: Serve with dollop of sour cream

name: Poutine
steps: Place hot fries in serving dish

name: Döner Kebab
steps: Marinate lamb in spices and yogurt overnight
Stuff pita with meat and vegetables

name: Ramen
steps: Top with sliced pork, egg, nori

name: Couscous
steps: Brown lamb, add vegetables and water
Serve stew over couscous with harissa

name: Pierogi
steps: Mix potato and cheese for filling

name: Pavlova
steps: Beat egg whites to soft peaks
Shape meringue, bake at 120°C for 1.5 hours

name: Bobotie
steps: Sauté onion, add beef and curry
Whisk egg and milk, pour over

name: Lobster Roll
steps: Mix lobster with mayo, lemon, celery

name: Chiles en Nogada
steps: Make picadillo filling with pork and fruits

name: Falafel
steps: Serve in pita with tahini sauce

name: Köttbullar
steps: Serve with mashed potatoes and jam

name: Hainanese Chicken Rice
steps: Cook rice in chicken fat and broth

name: Coxinha
steps: Make dough with broth and flour
Fill with chicken and cream cheese

name: Kebab Koobideh
steps: Mix lamb with onion and spices

name: Tarte Tatin
steps: Caramelize sugar and butter in oven-safe pan

name: Arroz con Pollo
steps: Add peas and olives last 5 minutes

name: Borscht
steps: Top with sour cream and dill

name: Fish and Chips
steps: Serve with chips, vinegar and sauce

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices

name: Rendang
steps: Simmer beef in coconut milk 1 hour

name: Sauerbraten
steps: Marinate beef 3-5 days in vinegar mixture

name: Poutine
steps: Place hot fries in serving dish

name: Cochinita Pibil
steps: Marinate pork in achiote mixture overnight
Line baking dish with banana leaves

name: Coddle
steps: Add water or Guinness to cover

name: Bandeja Paisa
steps: Arrange all items on large platter

name: Crawfish Étouffée
